entities.name: frank
entities.description: Frank is the main character in this conversation, who is speaking to someone he refers to as 'Lord Voldemort'. He is trying to assert his courage and bravery.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is a powerful and intimidating figure, referred to by Frank. He is described as knowing everything.

entities.name: police
entities.description: The police are mentioned as being interested in the conversation between Frank and Lord Voldemort.

relationships.description: Frank is speaking to Lord Voldemort, who responds with a cold voice.
Frank mentions that he has heard enough to interest the police.
